snippet: The ascent of Matteo Renzi, the charismatic young mayor of Florence, has jolted the Italian political landscape.
abstract: News analysis; Rise of Matteo Renzi, charismatic young mayor of Florence, has sent a jolt through the Italian political landscape; Renzi has become the leader of the center-left Democrat, country's largest party, winning a nationwide primary by a wide margin that has been interpreted by some analysts as an unequivocal mandate to shake things up.
lead_paragraph: The ascent of Matteo Renzi, the charismatic young mayor of Florence, has jolted the Italian political landscape.

headline.main: Rise of Young Leaders Signals a Mandate for Political Change in Italy
headline.print_headline: Rise of Young Leaders Signals a Mandate for Political Change in Italy
